page.title: 09Agriculture In Hoo.
page.content: Owing to increasing mechanisation on the farm in recent decades although agriculture dominates the landscape around the village very few people are permanently employed in this sector. As a generalisation the relatively mild coastal climate,and the lighter soils in places,along with the proxmity to major urban areas tends to favour{market gardening.}Some seasonal work at harvest time is therefore available for the villagers.The A2(M) has improved the link to London but the traditional use of New Covent Garden}Market as an outlet is being broken. For the large farms there is a tendency to sell produce on contract direct to large supermarket chains,and {PYO}and{farmshops}are proving to be increasingly popular.
